name: Arcanic
description: See the section on Fantastic Items for more information.

name: Asset:Type
description: May only be assigned to something which is an Item. If type Type is specified, then the Item must be of that Type or have that Trait.

name: Attack Effect
description: Trait may only be assigned to something which can attack or cause Damage.

name: Attribute
description: All Attributes except for SIZ may be improved using the Upgrade Attribute rules.

name: Firearm
description: This is a keyword and a name part.

name: Intrinsic
description: Limited for assignment to models by sculpt, or by its conceptual design.

name: Mind
description: Allow just one of these traits.

name: Movement
description: This trait provides benefits for Agility or Movement.

name: Mythos
description: Disregards Fear Tests and Sanity Tests. Elder Sign will affect this character. May not be assigned to character if it already has Invader or Outsider.

name: Outsider
description: May not be assigned to character if it already has Mythos or Invader.

name: Psionicist
description: Reveal targets using Psychic or Etheric traits within LOS. MEMSic if within 16 MU.

name: Ranged
description: This is a keyword and a name part.

name: Skill
description: May be acquired, reduced, or improved unless assigned to an Item.

name: Spellcaster
description: Reveal targets within LOS using any traits with the Magic keyword. Include Arcanic or Psychic if within 16 MU.

name: Suit
description: Allow just one of these traits and it must be assigned to Suit armor.

name: Unchanging
description: This character is disallowed to acquire Skill traits if it is not a Champion.

name: Weapon
description: This is a keyword and a name part.

name: Natural Weapon
description: This is a Melee Weapon to be used for the Close Combat Hit and Close Combat Damage Tests. Are not penalized for use in multiple attacks. May not use Overreach when attacking. Unless otherwise described, it is Accuracy +0, Impact +0, and uses STR for Damage.
